title: F.W. de Klerk, Last President of Apartheid South Africa, Dies at 85
content:
1. F.W. de Klerk, Last President of Apartheid South Africa, Dies at 85  The New York Times
  2. FW de Klerk, South Africa's last apartheid leader who freed Nelson Mandela, dies at 85  CNN
  3. F.W. de Klerk, South African Nobel Prize winner for opening government, dies at 85  The Washington Post
  4. F.W. de Klerk, South African President Who Helped End Apartheid, Dies at 85  The Wall Street Journal
  5. FW de Klerk: South Africa's former president dies at 85  BBC News

localize.title: 訃報】アパルトヘイト下の南アフリカ共和国最後の大統領、F.W.デクラーク氏が死去
种族隔离的南非最后一任总统F.W. de Klerk去世，享年85岁
種族隔離的南非最後一任總統F.W. de Klerk去世，享年85歲
